summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of Terraform module loading utilities, including local path resolution, handling of invalid sources, registry API endpoint selection, archive extension detection, Git source matching, version URL construction, download URL normalization, and version constraint parsing.
business_intent: To ensure the correctness and robustness of Terraform module loading mechanisms by automatically testing key behaviors and edge cases, thereby preventing regressions and guaranteeing reliable module retrieval and version handling.
